meta.title: Grades 3-5 - Northshore School District

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasLeftBanner fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout fsSection10459 fsHasTheme2 district-theme

li.a: Renewal Educational Programs and Operations Levy
Snow Bus Routes and Alternate Stops
How to Print at the Graphics Center
Screening, Brief Intervention and Referral To services (SBIRT)
Digital Tools for Teaching and Learning
When Should My Child Stay Home?
Schools Open or Closed to Waivers
What if my waiver is denied
King County Library Online Student Accounts
Credit Retrieval / 1st-Time Credit Core Classes: Course Descriptions
Inclusive Models and Practices Advisory Committee
Why won't my email go through?

a.title: district logo
a.strong: Strengthening Our Community Through Excellence in Education

li.a: Why won't my email go through?
Inclusive Models and Practices Advisory Committee
Why won't my email go through?

p.span: It is important to keep consistency for your student during these challenging times. We recommend creating a daily routine for your student. The schedule can be flexible to meet the needs of your family. The resources below may be helpful to incorporate into a daily routine. We will continue to add resources, so please check back.If your student's teachershaveprovided resources, you will continue to have access to those as well.

ul.li: Independent reading (read aloud, if needed):30 minutes per day
Other reading activities (e.g. Newsela): 30 minutes per day
Other math activities (e.g. Xtra Math): 30 minutes per day

p.strong: We highly encourage parents and guardians to read the terms and privacy policies before creating an account for any of the following resources.

div.class: fsElement fsPostElement fsGrid gray fsThumbnailRectangle fsThumbnailLarge fsItemCount_0

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1269 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-773 fsTag-774 fsTag-780

div.p: Abdo is an online digital library that is offering a free trial and is accessible via library.nsd.org.
Use:District Owned (access via library.nsd.org) or they are offering a free trial, family has the option to subscribe

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1258 fsTag-769 fsTag-771 fsTag-787

div.a: Art Docent Frameworks (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: All of the frameworks used in our NSD Art Docent Program are available online. Feel free to use these at home and to adapt to make them work with the resources you have available.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1269 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-772 fsTag-777 fsTag-778 fsTag-780

div.p: For as long as schools are closed, Audible is available. Kids everywhere can instantly stream an incredible collection of stories, including titles across six different languages, that will help them continue dreaming, learning, and just being kids.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1258 fsCategory-1262 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1223 fsCategory-1224 fsCategory-1256 fsCategory-1259 fsCategory-1255 fsCategory-1267 fsCategory-1260 fsCategory-1269 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-773 fsTag-774 fsTag-780 fsTag-781 fsTag-787 fsTag-794 fsTag-798

div.p: BrainPOP is an animated education site for kids covering a wide range of topics such as science, social studies, English, math, arts, music, health, and technology.
Use:District Owned. Contact your teacher, who will set up a class that you can join.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1269 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-777 fsTag-778 fsTag-785

div.p: Capstone Interactive is a collection of eBooks and every title includes audio recorded versions read aloud.
Use:District Owned (access via library.nsd.org and then using your Northshore account to view the password here)

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1221 fsTag-769 fsTag-771 fsTag-777 fsTag-778 fsTag-780

div.p: Children's Library provides free children's books in a wide range of languages.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1267 fsCategory-1269 fsTag-769 fsTag-771

div.a: Classics For Kids (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: Classics for Kids includes fun games exploring classical music and composers.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1223 fsCategory-1259 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-773 fsTag-774

div.p: Code.org is committed to providing students of all ages with the opportunity to learn about coding.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1269 fsCategory-1221 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-772

div.p: CommonLitis a nonprofit education technology organization dedicated to ensuring that all students graduate with the reading, writing, communication, and problem-solving skills they need to be successful in college and beyond.
Use: Parents have the option to subscribe

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1245 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1224 fsCategory-1256 fsCategory-1255 fsCategory-1223 fsCategory-1280 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-773 fsTag-774 fsTag-780 fsTag-782

div.a: Common Sense Media (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: Common Sense Media provides resources on digital citizenship and supporting families with engaging in technology.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1223 fsTag-769 fsTag-771 fsTag-773 fsTag-774 fsTag-786

div.p: Located in San Francisco, California, the Exploratorium is a public learning laboratory exploring the world through science, art, and human perception. Our mission is to create inquiry-based experiences that transform learning worldwide. Our vision is a world where people think for themselves and can confidently ask questions, question answers, and understand the world around them.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1260 fsCategory-1280 fsTag-769 fsTag-771 fsTag-781 fsTag-782 fsTag-806

div.p: GoNoodle provides movement and mindfulness activities for kids of all ages.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1261 fsTag-769 fsTag-795

div.a: Grades 3-5 Weekly Schedule Example (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: To provide additional support for families, we've created sample schedules you can use as a template to create your student's own daily routine.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1245 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1223 fsCategory-1255 fsCategory-1224 fsCategory-1256 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-773 fsTag-774 fsTag-777 fsTag-778 fsTag-780 fsTag-782

div.p: Access thousands of short video tutorials on a variety of subjects from "making a spreadsheet" to "social emotional learning". Log in with your student account information.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1262 fsCategory-1261 fsCategory-1269 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-773 fsTag-774

div.a: How to Learn Math (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: How to Learn Math is a free self-paced class for learners of all levels of mathematics. It combines important information on the brain with new evidence on the best ways to approach math effectively.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1224 fsTag-769 fsTag-770

div.p: Founded by Justice Sandra Day O'Connor, iCivics provides effective innovative, freely accessible resources that enhance practice and inspire classrooms.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1262 fsCategory-1261 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-795

div.a: iReady Family Video (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: This video by Curriculum Associates, the creators of iReady, helps explain how to appropriately use iReady to support student learning.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1255 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1262 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-777 fsTag-778 fsTag-781

div.a: iReady Online Reading and Math Instruction and Learning (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: Students participate in adaptive practice of both reading and math topics. This video helps explain the purpose and appropriate use of iReady.iReady has also created additional resources available here.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1269 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-773 fsTag-774

div.a: Junior Library Guild: Digital (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: The Junior Library Guild digital reading platform has eBooks for Elementary, Middle and High School students. They are offering a free trial and are also available via library.nsd.org.
Use:District Owned (access via library.nsd.org) or they are offering a free trial, family has the option to subscribe

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1260 fsCategory-1262 fsCategory-1223 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1261 fsCategory-1255 fsTag-769 fsTag-771 fsTag-781 fsTag-795

div.a: K-5 Online Access Information for Families (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: This document helps provide login information for various websites referenced throughout the Home Learning website, as well as login information to resources teachers might ask students to access.
Subject(s): Reading, Health & Fitness, Math, and Science

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1255 fsTag-769 fsTag-771 fsTag-777 fsTag-778 fsTag-780 fsTag-781

div.p: Through a free membership to King County Public Library you can access Tumblebooks, a digital library that reads books aloud. While not a substitute for in-person reading, it can be a fun activity!

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1213 fsCategory-1218 fsCategory-1219 fsCategory-1220 fsCategory-1255 fsCategory-1224 fsCategory-1223 fsCategory-1262 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-773 fsTag-774 fsTag-775 fsTag-778 fsTag-781 fsTag-785 fsTag-790 fsTag-791

div.p: Khan Academy offers practice exercises, instructional videos and a personalized learning dashboard that empower learners to study at their own pace in and outside of the classroom. Parents/Guardians can learnto use Khan Academy by following this link:https://bit.ly/2QaeHkR.Khan Academy also provides translated content, please visit these websites for translation instructions: Changing the Language, Setting a New Default Language, and Enabling Subtitles.
Subject:Math, Social Studies, Science, SAT/ACT Prep, Coding, and Computer Science.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1269 fsCategory-1224 fsCategory-1223 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-785

div.a: Learn with Smithsonian (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: Millions of Smithsonian digital images, recordings, texts, and videos in history, art and culture, and the sciences.
Use:Free lessons and resources. Fun Stuff With Kids does not require login. Learning Lab requires parent registration.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1269 fsCategory-1280 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-773 fsTag-774 fsTag-782

div.p: All NSD students have access to login to Minecraft EDU, where they can join lessons on math, science, and other amazing topics. Download the Minecraft app and login with your NSD apps.nsd.org credentials. (Works on Mac, Windows)

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1267 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-773 fsTag-774 fsTag-780 fsTag-794

div.p: Music Lab allows students to compose their own songs, explore rhythms and much more!

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1223 fsCategory-1269 fsTag-769 fsTag-771

div.p: Mystery Science has short videos based on science questions with follow up discussion and activities.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1269 fsCategory-1223 fsTag-769 fsTag-771

div.a: NASA Science Space Place (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: NASA Science Space Place provides hands on and online science activities and crafts for elementary students.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1223 fsCategory-1224 fsCategory-1221 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771

div.a: National Geographic Kids (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: NATIONAL GEOGRAPHIC KIDS features educational games, videos, and other activities, centered mostly on animals and the natural world. Kids alsocan get a virtual tour of different countries, featuring fun facts and other information. They can contribute to the site by posting comments (which are moderated), answering quizzes, and submitting photos.
Subject(s): Science, Social Studies and Reading

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1221 fsTag-769

div.p: Newsela offers authentic and engaging texts at a variety of reading levels.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1223 fsCategory-1255 fsCategory-1224 fsCategory-1245 fsCategory-1256 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-773 fsTag-774 fsTag-777 fsTag-778 fsTag-780 fsTag-781 fsTag-785

div.p: Access thousands of ebooks and audiobooks right from our own Libraries! Find your school library and log in with your student id and password. Then search for your next favorite thing to read!

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-773 fsTag-774 fsTag-777 fsTag-780 fsTag-785

div.a: NSD Website Translation Support (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: This document explains how to translate the NSD website.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1260 fsCategory-1269 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-773 fsTag-774 fsTag-806

div.p: OPEN (Online Physical Education Network) has a section dedicated to creating an active home. It includes activity logs and daily movement calendars in English and Spanish.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1262 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-773 fsTag-774 fsTag-778 fsTag-781 fsTag-785

div.a: OSPI Mathematics Resources (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: OSPI has started creating a list of free math resources students can access during school closures. As they plan to update frequently, please continue to check back.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1258 fsCategory-1262 fsCategory-1260 fsCategory-1269 fsCategory-1267 fsCategory-1261 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1223 fsCategory-1224 fsCategory-1255 fsCategory-1268 fsCategory-1259 fsCategory-1256 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-773 fsTag-774 fsTag-780 fsTag-795

div.a: OSPI: Resources for Continuous Learning During School Closures (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: If you're looking for even more Early Childhood through 12th grade resources, OSPI has created their own evolving list!

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1224 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-773 fsTag-774

div.a: OSPI Social Studies Resources (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: OSPI has compiled a list of Social Studies resources for a wide variety of grades.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1269 fsTag-769 fsTag-771

div.p: PebbleGo is a research tool for elementary age students including text and read aloud options on a variety of topics.
Use:District Owned (access via library.nsd.org and then using your Northshore account to view the password here)

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1260 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-773 fsTag-774 fsTag-780 fsTag-806

div.p: We encourage students of all ages to create an activity log to track their daily activity. Students can choose an activity they find enjoyable (e.g. walk, jog, jumping-jacks etc.). Depending on age, students benefit from different amounts of activities, but at least 30 minutes a day is a good starting point.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1260 fsCategory-1245 fsCategory-1269 fsCategory-1280 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-782

div.a: Playworks: Play at Home (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: Play is an essential part of life! Playworks has compiled games students can play at home, as well as started providing virtual recess times.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1258 fsCategory-1262 fsCategory-1260 fsCategory-1261 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1223 fsCategory-1245 fsCategory-1256 fsCategory-1259 fsCategory-1255 fsCategory-1224 fsCategory-1267 fsCategory-1268 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-773 fsTag-774 fsTag-780

div.a: Project Focused Learning (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: Students have the unique gift of time right now to explore their own interests and engage in create problem solving. This brief guide helps explain what Project Focused learning could look like.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1267 fsCategory-1269 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-794

div.p: Quaver music provides some free music content for students, as well as expanded content in a limited time free trial.
Use:Free trial, families have the option to subscribe

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1255 fsCategory-1224 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-777 fsTag-778 fsTag-781

div.a: Scholastic Learn at Home (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: Scholastic is providing free cross-curricular home learning resources including stories and videos. Many of their texts also include a 'text-to-speech' feature and the ability to adjust the reading level.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1269 fsCategory-1224 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-772 fsTag-785

div.a: Smithsonian's History Explorer (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: History Explorers resources focus on learning history by "reading" objects for the stories they hold about the nation and its many peoples. Learning activities feature artifacts selected from over 3 million items in the Museum's collections, and draw on the expertise of the Museum's renowned curatorial staff.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1221 fsTag-769 fsTag-771 fsTag-780

div.p: Starfall.com opened in September 2002 as a public service to teach children to read. Since then it has expanded to include language arts and mathematics for preschool, kindergarten, first grade, second grade, and third grade.
Use:Starfall contains some free resources while others may be purchased. Free resources are located under "Parent-Teacher Center" and the "Free Resource" tab"

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1262 fsTag-769 fsTag-771 fsTag-775

div.p: ST Maths patented approach - manipulating objects in space and time - is totally unique in the market. The program starts by teaching the foundational concepts visually, then connects the ideas to the symbols, language, and robust discourse.
Use:Free trial, family has the option to subscribe

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1255 fsTag-769 fsTag-771 fsTag-777 fsTag-778 fsTag-780 fsTag-781

div.p: Storyline Online provides videos of books read aloud. While it is not a substitute for in-person reading, it can be a fun activity!

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1269 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1245 fsCategory-1261 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-772 fsTag-782 fsTag-795

div.a: Teaching Tolerance Classroom Resources (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: Teaching Tolerance provides free resources to educators who work with children from kindergarten through high school. Educators use our materials to supplement the curriculum, to inform their practices, and to create civil and inclusive school communities where children are respected, valued and welcome participants.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1256 fsCategory-1224 fsCategory-1223 fsCategory-1269 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-772 fsTag-785

div.p: TED's education initiative makes short video lessons aimed at educators and students. Within TED-Eds growing library of lessons, you will find carefully curated educational videos, many of which are collaborations between educators and animators nominated through the TED-Ed platform.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1269 fsTag-769 fsTag-771 fsTag-778

div.a: The Daily Cafe (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: Free support for students including short video minilessons to help students build independent reading stamina.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1224 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-773 fsTag-774

div.a: The Learning Network (New York Times) (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: Teach and Learn With The Times: Resources for Bringing the World Into Your Classroom.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1255 fsCategory-1269 fsTag-769 fsTag-771 fsTag-777 fsTag-778

div.a: Time for Kids (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: Age-appropriate reading selections covering a wide-range of high-interest topics. High quality & fabulous selection!
Use:Free trial until the end of the school year, family has the option to subscribe.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1255 fsCategory-1259 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-781

div.p: Typing Club provides free typing practice to help increase typing ease and fine motor skills.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1224 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-772

div.a: Washington State Historical Society (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: In this section, you will find the stories of Washington and its connections to the world. Offerings range from complete curriculum units to individual lesson plans and student activities. Units provide both background materials on specific historical subjects and standards-based projects and assessments.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1262 fsCategory-1269 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-773 fsTag-774 fsTag-780 fsTag-785

div.a: Which One Doesn't Belong? (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: This site provides visuals and asks students to find a reason why each element of a set doesn't belong with the other three items.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1223 fsCategory-1224 fsCategory-1221 fsCategory-1269 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771

div.p: A question of the day blog that provides answers to frequently asked student questions. Includes texts with a read-to-me function with paired videos. Students can interact and pose their own "wonderings."

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1255 fsCategory-1262 fsTag-769 fsTag-771 fsTag-778 fsTag-781 fsTag-804

div.p: Xtra Math supports students in improvingbasic math fact fluency.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-1227 fsCategory-1262 fsCategory-1269 fsTag-769 fsTag-770 fsTag-771 fsTag-772 fsTag-785

div.a: YouCubed Math Tasks (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: YouCubed has a variety of engaging math tasks for students of all ages.

3330 Monte Villa Parkway, Bothell, WA 98021
Phone: 425-408-6000
Strengthening Our Community Through Excellence in Education

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window
